edu.frontrange.csc240.util

Class Debug

  • Object
    • edu.frontrange.csc240.util.Debug

  • public class Debug
extends Object
    This class wraps the functionality of PrintStream (printing to a given PrintStream) making the output conditional upon the state of the variable "debug". By setting this false, all debug output can be suppressed.

    These methods are used by writing the form: 

     Debug.printf( ... )

    or equivalently, the methods print, and println.

    As many other specific print methods of a given type may be added as needed using the same pattern. The implemented methods should include adding the "debug" indicator to the beginning of each line.

    Version:
    1.1, 2016-10-21.
    Author:
    Dr. Bruce K. Haddon
